passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(90) > div:nth-child(1) > header:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(91) > main:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > section > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(91) > div:nth-child(2) > footer > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
